javadoc:
A row in a grid.   This class stores it's row index, its x offset and its width.  The
 x value is the layout space x value of a {@link Point2D} object.   That is, unlike the
 {@link GridLocationMap}, the x value of this object is in layout space and not indexes 
 of a grid.
name: Column
comment:
A row in a grid.   This class stores it's row index, its x offset and its width.  The
 x value is the layout space x value of a Point2D object.   That is, unlike the
 GridLocationMap, the x value of this object is in layout space and not indexes 
 of a grid.

fields.javadoc: The layout x coordinate of the column
fields.name: x
fields.comment: The layout x coordinate of the column

fields.javadoc: The grid index of this column (0, 1...n) for the number of columns
fields.name: index
fields.comment: The grid index of this column (0, 1...n) for the number of columns
